org.apache.giraph.comm.netty

类 NettyWorkerClient<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.comm.netty.NettyWorkerClient<I,V,E,M>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    V - Vertex data
    E - Edge data
    M - Message data
    所有已实现的接口:
    WorkerClient<I,V,E,M>, ResetSuperstepMetricsObserver

    public class NettyWorkerClient<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Object
implements WorkerClient<I,V,E,M>, ResetSuperstepMetricsObserver
    Takes users facing APIs in WorkerClient and implements them using the available WritableRequest objects.

    • 构造器概要
